article: Maria lives in the beautiful countryside.She usually gets up early in the morning,  _  she's never late for schoo1.After getting up,she often showers and has a good breakfast.Then she  _  for school at around 6:30  _  her home is very far from school,she likes riding her bike better than  taking  the bus.It takes her about an hour  to ride  her bike.It's so long! On the way,she sings and sings so she always feels  _  .Also she thinks that it's good for her health  to go  to school by bike. After school she usually goes back  _  with her friend,Linda.Linda's home is nearer than Maria's. It's only three miles from her home  _  schoo1.Linda likes riding,too.And she also thinks that it is a good  _  of transportation.
